EmailTemplate.description: When partners close first CS deal
EmailTemplate.name: 18-05 CS First Deal
EmailTemplate.subject: You've Earned a BlueWave Community Solar Bonus!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations on your Latest BlueWave Community Solar Deal!
To celebrate your status as the first person from your company to close a Community Solar deal, we'd like to send you a $100 Visa Gift Card to use on whatever you love best.
How to Cash In: Let us know about your experience selling BlueWave Community Solar by filling out this brief survey: https://www.getfeedback.com/r/yERSRGxW
The survey concludes with asking you the best shipping address for your gift card so we can get it speeding your way in Priority Mail!
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy, - All of us here at BlueWave
partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com (888) 817-2703
bluewavesolar.com
